text: I love one thing on ODST! Gameplay perfectly reflect position of human soldiers in that war. You can feel from gameplay how helples they feel, but still they have to go on! You know I love spartans stuff too but there even in helpless situation you do not feel so sad cos hell They are spartans! They do not complain they fight!!! But this is different and still magnificent. I love as much ODST as Halo 1,2,3 and also Reach every one of them have something special and beautiful. Long live the HALO!

text: To be honest i'm surprised it took so long for you to upload a song from ODST. I figured it'd be up sooner.
